HomePage.modalContent: I am 19 years old, majoring in Computer Science, and have been studying programming since 2023, when I started learning logic and algorithms using VisualG. I've always been into the world of technology but never knew where to go until a cousin already established in the field recommended programming to me, and since then, I've been striving every day to become a Developer and above all, a successful person! Currently, I am part of a team of Freelancer friends, which I am sure is helping me to evolve more and more. ðŸš€

Projects.CryptoLine: Cryptocurrency quote app, built with React Js, Vite, Chakra UI, and CoinGeckoApi.
Projects.F1Roster: App where users can check information about the current Formula 1 season.
Projects.InovaTech: Fictitious institutional website, built with NextJs, TypeScript, and Chakra UI.
